mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FKART_TABLE (KNUM, KNAME, KMOOD ,KPRICE,KDELETEYN) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(A.KNUM), 0) + 1 AS CHABUN FROM FKART_TABLE A), #{fname}, #{fmood}, #{fprice}, 'Y' )
mapper.select:
SELECT A.KNUM KNUM ,A.KNAME KNAME ,A.KMOOD KMOOD ,A.KPRICE KPRICE ,A.KDELETEYN KDELETEYN
FROM FKART_TABLE A WHERE A.KDELETEYN = 'Y'
ORDER BY 1 DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FUNITURE_TABLE (FNUM, FNAME, FPRICE, FMOOD, FFILE, DELETEYN) VALUES( FUNITURE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{fname}, #{fprice}, #{fmood}, CONCAT('resources/include/img/', #{ffile}), 'Y' )
mapper.select:
SELECT A.FNUM FNUM ,A.FNAME FNAME ,A.FMOOD FMOOD ,A.FPRICE FPRICE ,A.FFILE FFILE ,A.DELETEYN DELETEYN
FROM FUNITURE_TABLE A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND A.FNUM = #{fnum}
mapper.update: UPDATE FUNITURE_TABLE SET DELETEYN = 'N' WHERE FNUM = #{fnum}
